question: What is the name of the application of the National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) for FASTag users?
explanation:
The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has recently updated its mobile application “My FASTag” with a new feature to check balance status.
In 2017, NHAI launched two mobile applications namely MyFASTag and FASTag Partner. While the former is for FASTag uses the latter is to be used by the merchants like CSCs, banking partners and vehicle dealers.
